songs.title: Lamborghini
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus: 2 Chainz]
I'm talkin Lamborghinis, I drop the top, make that bitch look like it's a bikini
Big boy shit, nigga, I hope that you listenin
I talk money, cause the more I talk money, the more that I get it

[Verse 1: 2 Chainz]
One thousand grams, surved underhand
I tax niggas, call me Uncle Sam
Yams, got Yams on my block
All we got is Baking Soda, Pyrax, Ziplock
We got this shit locked, nigga, click clanck
And the Mozerati move like a shark in a fish tank
And I don't really care what a bitch think
Lambo parked at where the Coke at, big bank

[Chorus: 2 Chainz]
I'm talkin Lamborghinis, I drop the top, make that bitch look like it's a bikini
Big boy shit, nigga, I hope that you listenin
I talk money, cause the more I talk money, the more that I get it

[Verse 2: OJ Da Juiceman]
Lamborghini, Lamborghini, yeah, I'm in the Lamborghini
Earned that black Lamborghini, doin mo strippin at Magic City
Fish Scale, white girl, like white girls in bikinis
Young Juiceman, goddamb, I unlocked the city
Big bank, big bank, all I want is big bank
Post up on that Boldercrest, blowin on that loud stank
Tity Boy, Tity Boy, yeah, that my homeboy
2 chains swangin back to back, that's so dumb, boy

[Chorus: 2 Chainz]
I'm talkin Lamborghinis, I drop the top, make that bitch look like it's a bikini
Big boy shit, nigga, I hope that you listenin
I talk money, cause the more I talk money, the more that I get it

[Verse 3: Young Ralph]
Cars love me, but I don't love a car
My Vert got Lambo doors, like it wanna hug a car
Big ryms on it, I'm right next to a star
Yeah, I'm lookin like a truck, when I'm next to a car
And I'm in and out of Whips, like a DMV
Yellow Mozerati, lookin like a Bumble Bee
Rollin down the window, like they don't know it's me
They probably don't, cause last time, I ain't have a V

[Chorus: 2 Chainz]
I'm talkin Lamborghinis, I drop the top, make that bitch look like it's a bikini
Big boy shit, nigga, I hope that you listenin
I talk money, cause the more I talk money, the more that I get it
